title: Chanda Kochhar-Videocon case: SC issues notice to former ICICI Bank head, husband on CBI's plea against bail granted by Bombay HC
description: The Supreme Court of India has issued a notice to former ICICI Bank CEO Chanda Kochhar and her husband Deepak Kochhar on a CBI plea against the Bombay High Court's order declaring their arrest illegal. The couple was arrested in 2022 over an alleged loan fraud case involving Videocon Group and granted interim bail in January 2023.
